name: Thrombose IRM
tagline: Unsupervised Classification, Machine Learning, Images Processing, Signal Processing, MRI analysis, Brain Pathologies, diagn
body:
### Welcome to Thrombose IRM Page.
This page provide the result of my bachelor study I have realize at the ENSTA Bretagne with the help of the CHRU Cavale Blanche of Brest and the INSERM of Lille.

The hole code of this project is realized in Matlab. The code can be download and the IRM used are aviable as a set of matlab file (.mat). The original github page can be found [here](https://github.com/chuzelph-ENSTA-Bretagne/ThromboseIRM).

### Purpose of this bachelor study
After many difficulties ...

### Unsupervised classification
The algorithm used here is the spectral classification. The main interest of this spectral classification is that it is adapted to signal classification. Thanks to the perfusion IRM, we can extract signal which provide information about the part of the brain we are studying. The whole code can be reused for other application as long as you reshape your input inside a matrix m*n where the row m correspond to the sample m and n correspond to the descriptors of each sample.

### Quick explanation

![Example of affinity matrix](https://github.com/chuzelph-ENSTA-Bretagne/ThromboseIRM/blob/master/RapportVersionFinale/Images/matrixAffinity.png)


### Results

In the end, we arrived to those results
